alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Greer; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 12:13AM CDT until August 09 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southeastern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Western Custer County in western Oklahoma... North central Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1213 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Cheyenne to 4 miles north of Carter to 3 miles east of Willow, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Cheyenne, Burns Flat, Sentinel, Hammon, Dill City, Canute, Butler, Carter, Rocky, Foss, Strong City, Retrop, Delhi, Foss Reservoir, Moorewood, Berlin, and Stafford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Greer; Roger Mills; Washita
